energy_efficiency_source.notes: Integrated 120V 15A for existing homes to avoid panel upgrade, consistent with costs

installed_cost_source.notes: Median of ENERGY STAR v4.0 total installed cost range; added costs of $250 for a 120V circuit for the water heater based on the lower bound of the upgrade/new branch circuit cost in NV5 report
